attributes.action: ensure the MP's who are stepping down over the expenses scandal should resign with immediate effect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: And not to qualify for the extra bonuses

rejection.details: Government does not control who sits in Parliament. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/ or the relevant political party(ies).
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
